\/C:\/Users\/admin\/Desktop\/codepool\/_: How to Build a Zapier Integration to Scan Barcodes
如何创建一个Zapier集成以在工作流中集成扫码功能
How to Build a Zapier Integration to Scan Barcodes
The article shares how to build a Zapier integration to scan barcodes with Dynamsoft Barcode Reader.
本文介绍了如何创建一个Zapier集成以使用Dynamsoft Barcode Reader扫描条码。
The article shares how to build a Zapier integration to scan barcodes with Dynamsoft Barcode Reader.
Zapier is a workflow automation platform.
Zapier是一个工作流程自动化平台。
Zapier is a workflow automation platform.
It has integrated over 6000 applications and we can chain different applications in the same workflow without writing code.
它集成了6000多个应用程序，我们可以在同一个工作流程中链接不同的应用程序去使用它们，并且无需编写代码。
It has integrated over 6000 applications and we can chain different applications in the same workflow without writing code.
In this article, we are going to build a Zapier app integration to scan barcodes.
在本文中，我们将创建一个Zapier应用集成来集成条码扫描功能。
In this article, we are going to build a Zapier app integration to scan barcodes.
We can scan barcodes in a web application and the app will trigger workflows.
当我们在Web应用里扫了一个码，它就会触发对应的工作流。
We can scan barcodes in a web application and the app will trigger workflows.
<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1> is used for barcode scanning.
扫码功能由<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1>提供。
<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1> is used for barcode scanning.
Scan Barcodes to Trigger Workflows in Zapier
扫描条码以触发Zapier工作流
Scan Barcodes to Trigger Workflows in Zapier
Since an integration cannot work alone, let's try to implement a whole solution to scan barcodes to trigger workflows in Zapier.
由于Zapier集成无法单独工作，下面我们会去实现一个完整的解决方案，做到扫码触发Zapier中的工作流程。
Since an integration cannot work alone, let's try to implement a whole solution to scan barcodes to trigger workflows in Zapier.
Build a barcode scanning web app.
构建一个条码扫描Web应用。
Build a barcode scanning web app.
Build a Zapier app integration to use the barcode scanning web app.
构建一个Zapier应用集成以使用上一步的条码扫描应用。
Build a Zapier app integration to use the barcode scanning web app.
Build a Zap (workflow) to use the integration.
构建一个Zap（工作流程）来使用上一步的集成。
Build a Zap (workflow) to use the integration.
Let's create a Python backend and a web frontend with vanilla JS.
让我们创建一个Python后端和一个前端页面。
Let's create a Python backend and a web frontend with vanilla JS.
The frontend generates a UUID as the unique identifier and sends the scanned barcodes to the backend.
前端生成一个UUID作为唯一标识符，并将扫描的条码发给后端。
The frontend generates a UUID as the unique identifier and sends the scanned barcodes to the backend.
The backend has two endpoints to serve as a polling server for a Zapier integration.
后端有两个接口，可以被Zapier的轮询服务器调用。
The backend has two endpoints to serve as a polling server for a Zapier integration.
<g1>/code</g1> for adding a barcode and retrieving the scanned barcode of a device (device is differentiated by UUID).
<g1>/code</g1>用于添加条码和获取某个设备上扫描的码（设备由UUID区分）。
<g1>/code</g1> for adding a barcode and retrieving the scanned barcode of a device (device is differentiated by UUID).
The <g1>/code</g1> endpoint would return scanned barcodes in an array like the following:
<g1>/code</g1>接口可以返回一串数组，包含扫描的条码数据，如下所示：
The <g1>/code</g1> endpoint would return scanned barcodes in an array like the following:
Timestamp is used as the ID so that we can scan multiple barcodes and Zapier's deduplication mechanism will treat them as different records.
时间戳用作ID ，以便我们可以扫描多个条码，并且 Zapier的重复数据删除机制会将它们视为不同的记录。
Timestamp is used as the ID so that we can scan multiple barcodes and Zapier's deduplication mechanism will treat them as different records.
Here we use Flask as the framework to provide two endpoints:
这里，我们使用Flask作为框架来提供两个接口：
Here we use Flask as the framework to provide two endpoints:
Here, it always returns true as we are using UUID as the identifier and no authorization is actually required.
这个接口总是返回true ，因为我们使用UUID作为标识符，实际上不需要授权。
Here, it always returns true as we are using UUID as the identifier and no authorization is actually required.
If the method is <g1>POST</g1>, add a new barcode item in the <g2>data</g2> dict.
如果方法为<g1>POST</g1> ，则在<g2>data</g2>字典中添加新的条码项。
If the method is <g1>POST</g1>, add a new barcode item in the <g2>data</g2> dict.
If the method is <g3>GET</g3>, return the scanned barcodes of a UUID in an array.
如果方法为<g3>GET</g3> ，则返回某个UUID的条码数组。
If the method is <g3>GET</g3>, return the scanned barcodes of a UUID in an array.
Serve static files under the root.
在根目录下提供静态文件。
Serve static files under the root.

使用以下模板创建新的<g1>scanner.html</g1>文件：

Initialize the product with a license.

可以在<g1>这里</g1>申请一个证书。
Create an instance of Camera Enhancer to open the camera.
创建一个Camera Enhancer实例来打开摄像头。
Create an instance of Camera Enhancer to open the camera.
Add the following element as the container for the camera view.
将以下元素添加为摄像头控件的容器。
Add the following element as the container for the camera view.
Create an instance of Capture Router to read barcodes from the camera frames.
创建一个Capture Router实例以从视频帧读取条码。
Create an instance of Capture Router to read barcodes from the camera frames.
The barcode reading results can be received in the <g1>onDecodedBarcodesReceived</g1> callback.
条码读取结果可以在<g1>onDecodedBarcodesReceived</g1>回调中得到。
The barcode reading results can be received in the <g1>onDecodedBarcodesReceived</g1> callback.
Here, we save the result in a text input.
这里，我们将结果保存在一个文本输入框中。
Here, we save the result in a text input.
Generate or load the UUID when the app starts.
应用启动时生成或读取UUID。
Generate or load the UUID when the app starts.
Send the barcode to the backend.
Send the barcode to the backend.
The web barcode scanner is implemented.
这样Web条码扫描应用就写好了。
The web barcode scanner is implemented.
We can deploy it to a platform like Vercel for production usage.
我们可以将其部署到像Vercel这样的平台上供生产使用。
We can deploy it to a platform like Vercel for production usage.
Go to <g1>developer.zapier.com</g1> and let's build a new integration with Platform UI.
访问<g1>developer.zapier.com</g1>，用Platform UI建立新的集成。

Choose <g1>API Key</g1> to set up the authentication.
选择<g1>API Key</g1>以设置身份验证。
Choose <g1>API Key</g1> to set up the authentication.
添加两个身份验证字段：
Set up the endpoint URL for authentication.
Set up the endpoint URL for authentication.
Specify <g1>Device Name</g1> as the connection label so that users can see the name in a zap's setup page.
将<g1>Device Name设备名称</g1>指定为Connection Label连接标签，以便用户可以在Zap的设置页面中看到该名称。
Specify <g1>Device Name</g1> as the connection label so that users can see the name in a zap's setup page.
Create a new trigger named <g1>Barcode Scanned</g1>.
创建一个名为<g1>Barcode Scanned</g1>的触发器。

Here is the workflow we are going to make.
以下是我们将要制定的工作流程。
Here is the workflow we are going to make.
Trigger the workflow when an ISBN barcode of a book is scanned.
扫描图书的ISBN条码，触发工作流程。
Trigger the workflow when an ISBN barcode of a book is scanned.
Query the book's info via Google's API by running JavaScript.
运行JavaScript代码，通过Google的API查询图书信息。
Query the book's info via Google's API by running JavaScript.
Create a new Notion record to store the scanned book.
创建新的Notion数据库记录以存储扫描的图书。
Create a new Notion record to store the scanned book.
Create a new zap and select <g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1> integration we made as the trigger.
创建新的Zap并选择我们刚制作的<g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1>集成作为触发器。
Create a new zap and select <g1>Dynamsoft Barcode Reader</g1> integration we made as the trigger.
Connect to an account by entering the UUID and device name.
在账号连接步骤，输入UUID和设备名称。
Connect to an account by entering the UUID and device name.
Scan a barcode in the web barcode scanner and send it to Zapier.
在条码扫描Web应用中扫码，并将其发送到Zapier。
Scan a barcode in the web barcode scanner and send it to Zapier.

然后，我们可以在测试步骤中获取记录。

Next, create a step to run JavaScript code to get the book's info like title, author and description.
